sense.name: delegate, deputy 代替个人或集体发表意见或担任工作的人
sense.commentary: Aperson chosen or elected by a group to represent them, esp. at a meeting.
sense.examples:
赴会的代表 a delegate to a conference
列席代表 delegates without power to vote
(中国)人民代表大会代表 a deputy to National People's Congress

sense.name: representative 能显示同一类事物共同特征的人或事物
sense.commentary: Serving to describe, esp. a larger group of the same type.
sense.examples:
古希腊艺术代表作品 a representative collection of ancient Greek art
好莱坞的代表人物 the representative figure in Hollywood
